meanings.definition: To make something smaller or less significant.
meanings.sent1: She carefully muntinged the picture to fit the frame.
meanings.sent2: He decided to munting his workload by delegating tasks.
meanings.sent3: The magician muntinged the rabbit, making it disappear.
meanings.sent4: The rain muntinged the sandcastle, washing it away.
meanings.sent5: The chef muntinged the recipe to serve fewer guests.
